languages.text: Кассия Орселлио усвоила каждый горький урок, полученный в странствиях с Вольным Торговцем. Она стала Новатором Дома вопреки собственным страхам, ненависти сородичей и манипуляциям регента. Но главное — вопреки Вольному Торговцу, ненависть к которо{mf|му|й} преследовала ее всю жизнь. Подобно своей предшественнице, Кассия правила Домом Орселлио железной рукой — с помощью силы и страха.

Cassia Orsellio learned from every bitter lesson she was given throughout her travels with the Rogue Trader. She became the Novator of her House in spite of her own fear, her hatred of her kin, and her regent's manipulations. But most of all, she did it in defiance of the Rogue Trader, whom she despised until the end of her life. Like her predecessor, Cassia ruled House Orsellio with an iron fist — through force and fear.
languages.original_text: Кассия Орселлио усвоила каждый горький урок, полученный в странствиях с Вольным Торговцем. Подобно своей предшественнице, Кассия правила Домом Орселлио железной рукой — с помощью силы и страха.

traits.locale_text: Cassia Orsellio learned every bitter lesson in her travels with the Rogue Trader. She became a Novator of her House in spite of her own fear, hatred of her kin, and Regent's manipulations. But most of all — in defiance of Rogue Trader, whom she despised until the end of her life. Like her predecessor, Cassia ruled the House Orsellio with an iron fist — through force and through fear.

But most of all — in defiance of Rogue Trader, whom she despised until the end of her life. Like her predecessor, Cassia ruled the House Orsellio with an iron fist — through force and through fear.

languages.text: 卡西娅·奥赛罗在与行商浪人的旅行中吸取了无数痛苦的教训。尽管她怀着恐惧，怀着对族人的恨意，还要受到摄政王的操控，但她依然选择成为了家族的大族长。她之所以作出这样的决定，最重要的原因便是她对行商浪人的蔑视。她始终蔑视着这个人，直至生命的尽头。卡西娅与像她的前任一样，通将力量与恐惧当做她的工具，以铁腕手段统治着奥赛罗家族。
languages.original_text: Cassia Orsellio learned from every bitter lesson she was given throughout her travels with the Rogue Trader. She became the Novator of her House in spite of her own fear, her hatred of her kin, and her regent's manipulations. But most of all, she did it in defiance of the Rogue Trader, whom she despised until the end of her life. Like her predecessor, Cassia ruled House Orsellio with an iron fist — through force and fear.

traits.locale_text: 卡西娅·奥塞罗在与行商浪人的旅行中吸取了无数痛苦的教训。尽管她怀着恐惧，怀着对族人的恨意，还要受到摄政王的操控，但她依然选择成为了家族的大族长。她之所以作出这样的决定，最重要的原因便是她对行商浪人的蔑视。她始终蔑视着这个人，直至生命的尽头。卡西娅与像她的前任一样，通将力量与恐惧当做她的工具，以铁腕手段统治着奥塞罗家族。

languages.text: Cassia Orsellio lernte aus jeder bitteren Lektion, die ihr den Reisen mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} erteilt wurde. Sie wurde trotz ihrer Ängste, ihres Hasses gegen ihre Verwandtschaft und der Manipulationen ihres Regenten zur Novatorin ihres Hauses. Vor allem aber tat sie es {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} zum Trotz, {mf|den|die} sie bis ans Ende ihres Lebens verabscheute. Wie ihre Vorgängerin herrschte Cassia mit eiserner Faust über Haus Orsellio — durch Gewalt und Angst.
languages.original_text: Cassia Orsellio learned from every bitter lesson she was given throughout her travels with the Rogue Trader. She became the Novator of her House in spite of her own fear, her hatred of her kin, and her regent's manipulations. But most of all, she did it in defiance of the Rogue Trader, whom she despised until the end of her life. Like her predecessor, Cassia ruled House Orsellio with an iron fist — through force and fear.

traits.locale_text: Cassia Orsellio lernte bei ihren Reisen mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} jede bittere Lektion. Sie wurde trotz ihrer Ängste, ihres Hasses gegen ihre Verwandtschaft und der Manipulationen ihres Regenten zur Novatorin ihres Hauses. Vor allem aber tat sie es {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} zum Trotz, {mf|den|die} sie bis ans Ende ihres Lebens verabscheute. Wie ihre Vorgängerin herrschte Cassia mit eiserner Faust über Haus Orsellio — durch Gewalt und Angst.

languages.text: Cassia Orsellio tira bien des amères leçons de ses nombreux voyages avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Elle devint la Novator de sa maison en dépit de ses propres craintes, de sa haine envers ses semblables et des manipulations de son régent. Mais elle accepta ce titre avant tout pour défier {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} qu'elle méprisa jusqu'à la fin de ses jours. Comme son prédécesseur, Cassia régna d'une main de fer sur une maison Orsellio apeurée.
languages.original_text: Cassia Orsellio learned from every bitter lesson she was given throughout her travels with the Rogue Trader. She became the Novator of her House in spite of her own fear, her hatred of her kin, and her regent's manipulations. But most of all, she did it in defiance of the Rogue Trader, whom she despised until the end of her life. Like her predecessor, Cassia ruled House Orsellio with an iron fist — through force and fear.

traits.locale_text: Cassia Orsellio apprit d'amères leçons au cours de ses voyages avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Elle devint la Novator de sa maison en dépit de ses propres craintes, de sa haine envers ses semblables et des manipulations de son régent. Mais elle accepta ce titre avant tout pour défier {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} qu'elle méprisa jusqu'à la fin de ses jours. Comme son prédécesseur, Cassia régna d'une main de fer sur une maison Orsellio apeurée.

languages.text: Cassia Orsellio aprendió de todas las lecciones amargas que sufrió en sus viajes con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. Se convirtió en la Novator de su casa a pesar de su miedo, su odio hacia los suyos y las manipulaciones de su regente. Pero, por encima de todo, lo hizo para desafiar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, a{mf|l| la} que odiaría hasta el fin de sus días. Al igual que su predecesora, Cassia gobernó la casa Orsellio con mano de hierro, a través de la fuerza y el miedo.
languages.original_text: Cassia Orsellio learned from every bitter lesson she was given throughout her travels with the Rogue Trader. She became the Novator of her House in spite of her own fear, her hatred of her kin, and her regent's manipulations. But most of all, she did it in defiance of the Rogue Trader, whom she despised until the end of her life. Like her predecessor, Cassia ruled House Orsellio with an iron fist — through force and fear.

traits.locale_text: Cassia Orsellio aprendió todas las lecciones amargas que necesitaba en sus viajes con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. Se convirtió en Novator de su casa a pesar de su miedo, su odio hacia los suyos y las manipulaciones de su regente. Pero, por encima de todo, lo hizo para desafiar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, a{mf|l| la} que odiaría hasta el fin de sus días. Al igual que su predecesora, Cassia gobernó la casa Orsellio con mano de hierro, a través de la fuerza y el miedo.

languages.text: カシア・オーセリオは、自由開拓者との旅を通して苦い教訓を学んだ。彼女は自分の怖れや親族に対する憎しみ、摂政の策略にも屈せず、オーセリオ家のノベイターとなった。しかし彼女がそれを成し遂げたのは、生涯にわたって蔑み続けた自由開拓者に反抗するためだった。前任者と同じく、カシアはオーセリオ家を鉄拳で — つまり力と恐怖によって支配した。
languages.original_text: Cassia Orsellio learned from every bitter lesson she was given throughout her travels with the Rogue Trader. She became the Novator of her House in spite of her own fear, her hatred of her kin, and her regent's manipulations. But most of all, she did it in defiance of the Rogue Trader, whom she despised until the end of her life. Like her predecessor, Cassia ruled House Orsellio with an iron fist — through force and fear.

traits.locale_text: カシア・オーセリオは、自由開拓者との旅を通して苦い教訓を学んだ。彼女は自分の怖れや親族に対する憎しみ、摂政の策略にも屈せず、オーセリオ家のノベイターとなった。しかし彼女がそれを成し遂げたのは、生涯にわたって蔑み続けた自由開拓者に反抗するためだった。前任者と同じく、カシアはオーセリオ家を鉄拳で — つまり力と恐怖によって支配した。

languages.text: Cassia Orsellio, Hür Tacir'le yaptığı yolculuklardan birçok acı ders çıkarıp birçok şey öğrendi. İçindeki korkuya, soydaşlarının nefretine ve naibinin manipülasyonlarına rağmen Hanesinin Rota Reisi oldu. Ancak en önemlisi, bunu ömrünün sonuna kadar nefret beslediği Hür Tacir'e karşı çıkarak yaptı. Cassia da selefi gibi Orsellio Hanesi'ni demir bir yumrukla, güç kullanarak ve korku saçarak yönetti.
languages.original_text: Cassia Orsellio learned from every bitter lesson she was given throughout her travels with the Rogue Trader. She became the Novator of her House in spite of her own fear, her hatred of her kin, and her regent's manipulations. But most of all, she did it in defiance of the Rogue Trader, whom she despised until the end of her life. Like her predecessor, Cassia ruled House Orsellio with an iron fist — through force and fear.

traits.locale_text: Cassia Orsellio, Hür Tacir'le yaptığı yolculuklardan birçok acı ders çıkardı ve birçok şey öğrendi. İçindeki korkuya, soydaşlarının nefretine ve naibinin manipülasyonlarına rağmen Hane'sinin Rota Reisi oldu. Ancak en önemlisi, bunu Hür Tacir'e karşı çıkarak yaptı ve ona hayatının sonuna kadar nefret besledi. Cassia da selefi gibi Orsellio Hanesi'ni demir bir yumrukla, güç kullanarak ve korku saçarak yönetti.
